posts.post_content: S74 colored silk of Roger Bresnahan very sharp CSG 5 $325.00 delivered. Strong image. Check or money order only. No electronic payments. New York residents must add sales tax. As always, "I'll take it" trumps ongoing negotiations or requests for additional information. Please direct all correspondence to my email [url]edhans@monkberry.com[/url]. Please visit my newly updated website below for larger scans and additional cards. Thank you for looking.

[quote name="edhans" post=2308869]S74 colored silk of Roger Bresnahan very sharp CSG 5 $325.00 delivered. Strong image. Check or money order only. No electronic payments. New York residents must add sales tax. As always, "I'll take it" trumps ongoing negotiations or requests for additional information. Please direct all correspondence to my email [url]edhans@monkberry.com[/url]. Please visit my newly updated website below for larger scans and additional cards. Thank you for looking.[/QUOTE]

Nice item Ed, GLWS.  Also, did not know that CSG was grading S74s.  Interesting that it seems PSA is the only one of the Big Four TPGs that still won't grade S74 silks.  I wonder if this might finally change their thinking in the future.
